/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene winter scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian on a snowy street, moving towards the right side of the frame. The street, blanketed in snow, is flanked by trees on both sides, their bare branches reaching out into the clear blue sky. The sun, positioned in the top right corner of the image, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene, creating a stark contrast between the white snow and the blue sky. The image does not contain any discernible text or countable objects. The relative positions of the objects suggest a quiet, early morning or late evening setting, with no people or moving vehicles in sight. The image exudes a sense of tranquility and solitude, characteristic of a snowy day in a city like Beijing.
